title: T206 John McGraw Glove at Hip PSA 5 EX
author: M's_Fan

posts.post_title: T206 John McGraw Glove at Hip PSA 5 EX
posts.post_content:
Very sharp corners, no creases, great colors, a beauty.  

Looking for $373 which is exactly what a PSA 5 went for in a recent eBay auction.  If no takers soon, it will go up on the bay with my other T206 cards.

[IMG]http://i672.photobucket.com/albums/vv82/3fingerbrown/T206%20HOF%20For%20Sale/Mcgrawgloveathip318psa5.jpg?t=1288041109[/IMG][IMG]http://i672.photobucket.com/albums/vv82/3fingerbrown/T206%20HOF%20For%20Sale/Mcgrawgloveathipz318psa5.jpg?t=1288041109[/IMG]
